property.name: insertQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.homolog_group_gene ( group_gene_id, group_id, gene_id, tax_id, database_id ) VALUES ( :GROUP_GENE_ID, :GROUP_ID, :GENE_ID, :TAX_ID, :DATABASE_ID )

property.name: loadQuery
property.value: SELECT hgg.group_gene_id as group_gene_id, hgg.group_id as group_id, hgg.gene_id as gene_id, hgg.tax_id as tax_id, hgg.database_id as database_id, desc.symbol as symbol, desc.title as title, desc.prot_gi as prot_gi, desc.prot_acc as prot_acc, desc.prot_len as prot_len, desc.nuc_gi as nuc_gi, desc.nuc_acc as nuc_acc, desc.locus_tag as locus_tag, dmn.domain_id, dmn.begin, dmn.end, dmn.pssmid, dmn.cddid, dmn.cddname, als.alias_id as alias_id, als.name as name FROM catgenome.homolog_group_gene hgg left join catgenome.homolog_gene_desc desc on hgg.gene_id = desc.gene_id left join catgenome.homolog_gene_domain dmn on dmn.gene_id = desc.gene_id left join catgenome.homolog_gene_alias als on als.gene_id = desc.gene_id
